Title: Academic Success Accounting System
Description: The system is intended to use by school teacher to set marks to students and estimate their academic success and possibilities. The client application uses SQL Server Compact as data store and WPF user interface.
HomeWiki:
Academic Success Accounting System
The system is intended to use by school teacher to set marks to students and estimate their academic success and possibilities. The client application uses SQL Server Compact as data store and WPF user interface.

Technologies
.NET Framework 3.5 SP1
Microsoft Visual Studio 2010
Microsoft SQL Server Compact
NHibernate
